Case 1: SNP found in Bait, Gene found in OE
```{r case_1}

y <- HiC_data_2 %>% 
    filter(franke_trans_data$SNPChr[1] == baitChr) %>%
    filter(franke_trans_data$SNPPos[1] >= baitStart) %>%
    filter(franke_trans_data$SNPPos[1] <= baitEnd)
if (dim(y)[1] != 0){
  z <- cbind(1, y[, c("baitChr", "baitStart", "baitEnd", "baitID", "baitName", "oeChr", "oeStart", "oeEnd", "oeID", "oeName")], franke_trans_data[1,c("SNP", "SNPChr", "SNPPos", "Gene", "GeneSymbol", "GeneChr", "GenePos")])
  snp_bait_match <- z
} else {
  snp_bait_match <- rnorm(18)
}

for (i in 2:nrow(franke_trans_data)){
  y <- HiC_data_2 %>% 
    filter(franke_trans_data$SNPChr[i] == baitChr) %>%
    filter(franke_trans_data$SNPPos[i] >= baitStart) %>%
    filter(franke_trans_data$SNPPos[i] <= baitEnd)
  if (dim(y)[1] != 0){
    z <- cbind(i, y[, c("baitChr", "baitStart", "baitEnd", "baitID", "baitName", "oeChr", "oeStart", "oeEnd", "oeID", "oeName")], franke_trans_data[i,c("SNP", "SNPChr", "SNPPos", "Gene", "GeneSymbol", "GeneChr", "GenePos")])
    snp_bait_match <- rbind(snp_bait_match, z, use.names=F)
  }
  if (i %% 1000 == 0) print(i)
}

colnames(snp_bait_match) <- c("row_eQTLGen", "baitChr", "baitStart", "baitEnd", "baitID", "baitName", "oeChr_poss", "oeStart_poss", "oeEnd_poss", "oeID_poss", "oeName_poss", "SNP", "SNPChr", "SNPPos", "Gene", "GeneSymbol", "GeneChr", "GenePos")
```

```{r}
franke_trans_data$rank <- 1:nrow(franke_trans_data)

snp_in_bait_gene_in_oe_list <- function(zz){
   y <- HiC_data_2 %>%
    filter(zz[,"SNPChr"] == baitChr) %>%
    filter(zz[,"SNPPos"] >= baitStart) %>%
    filter(zz[,"SNPPos"] <= baitEnd)
   if (dim(y)[1] != 0){
    z <- cbind(zz[,c("rank")], y[, c("baitChr", "baitStart", "baitEnd", "baitID", "baitName", "oeChr", "oeStart", "oeEnd", "oeID", "oeName")], zz[,c("SNP", "SNPChr", "SNPPos", "Gene", "GeneSymbol", "GeneChr", "GenePos")])
    #snp_bait_match <- rbind(snp_bait_match, z, use.names=F)
    
    colnames(z) <- c("row_eQTLGen", "baitChr", "baitStart", "baitEnd", "baitID", "baitName", "oeChr_poss", "oeStart_poss", "oeEnd_poss", "oeID_poss", "oeName_poss", "SNP", "SNPChr", "SNPPos", "Gene", "GeneSymbol", "GeneChr", "GenePos")
    
    zzz <- z %>% 
    filter(GeneChr == oeChr_poss) %>%
    filter(GenePos >= oeStart_poss) %>%
    filter(GenePos <= oeEnd_poss)

    return(zzz[,"row_eQTLGen"])
   } else{
    return(0)
   }
}

snp_in_oe_list <- function(zz){
   y <- HiC_data_2 %>%
    filter(zz$SNPChr == baitChr) %>%
    filter(zz$SNPPos >= baitStart) %>%
    filter(zz$SNPPos <= baitEnd)
   if (dim(y)[1] != 0){
    z <- cbind(zz[,c("rank")], y[, c("baitChr", "baitStart", "baitEnd", "baitID", "baitName", "oeChr", "oeStart", "oeEnd", "oeID", "oeName")], zz[,c("SNP", "SNPChr", "SNPPos", "Gene", "GeneSymbol", "GeneChr", "GenePos")])
    #snp_bait_match <- rbind(snp_bait_match, z, use.names=F)
    return(z)
   } else{
    return(0)
   }
}
```
